author: Staff Reporter
text:
A flying squad of the Election Commission of India seized Rs. 2 lakh cash from a honey trader in Azhagiyamandapam near Thuckalay under the jurisdiction of Padmanabhapuram constituency on Saturday morning.

According to officials, the flying squad led by Vinu intercepted an omni bus proceeding to Marthandam from Coimbatore and checked the baggage of the passengers. They found that Chandrasekaran, a honey merchant hailing from Udumalpet in Tiruppur district was in possession of Rs. 2 lakh.

‘Produce documents’

Though he claimed that he brought money for buying honey, the squad seized the cash and asked him to produce documents and get back his money.

So far Rs. 1.01 lakh and Rs. 92,000 had been seized from two persons in Swamiyarmadam and Nithiravilai in the district.
title: Rs. 2 lakh cash seized from honey trader
